definitions: The action of catching an animal with a rope or lasso.
The action of securing or tying with a rope.
The action of forming into rope-like strands.
The action of enclosing an area with ropes.
examples: The cowboy was skilled at roping cattle.
The sailors were roping the cargo to the deck.
The machine was roping the fibers into a strong cord.
They were roping off the construction site.
